parameters.Name: Verbose
parameters.Description: Turn on verbose output (also shows more command-line options).

parameters.Name: Only Entities
parameters.Description: Only import the entities from the VMF. Brushes and internal entities are not modified. Conserves existing lighting data.

parameters.Name: Only Props
parameters.Description: Only update static and detail props (i.e. the internal entities). Does not generate a .prt file, making VVIS fail!

parameters.Name: Leak Test
parameters.Description: Stop processing the map if a leak is detected. For older versions of the source engine.

parameters.Name: All Detail
parameters.Description: Makes all geometry not split visleaves, improving vvis times. Use with -radius_override 2500 on VVIS.
